mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ORG_DEPT_PROPERTY_DICT WHERE del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY sort, update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_dept_property_dict( id, property_type, property_name, property_value, org_id, sort, remarks, update_by, create_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{propertyType}, #{propertyName}, #{propertyValue}, #{orgId}, #{sort}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy}, #{createBy}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE org_dept_property_dict SET property_type = #{propertyType}, property_name = #{propertyName}, property_value = #{propertyValue}, org_id = #{orgId}, sort = #{sort}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
